Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 151st overall pick, by San Diego in 2009...
Injured on 9/7/2011 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/17/2012 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/8/2014 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/9/2015 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2017, off Trevor Bauer (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2017, off Vinnie Pestano (COL)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 4/4/2018...
Traded from San Diego to Chicago (A) on 2/8/2019 (Going to SDN: P I. Joly, SS J. Cronin Jr., CF G. Gilmore Jr.. Going to CHA: LF C. Yelich, 3B M. Rivera)...
Injured on 4/7/2019 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Released by Chicago (A) on 7/3/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/3/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $437,143 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 7/24/2021...
